info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32906
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32906
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 4, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"cisco-ci-domain-verification=4f0dbd28841cdec33cfa3966c36911028ffbbcd90a6a9c4b34ecd75286ea17d2"
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.sante.gouv.fr include:_spf.pfai.rie.gouv.fr include:_spf-njo.cegedim.fr ~all"
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"MS=ms10035681"
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"R+PuUwRUOuIkhtFtitRXWrMTFS6Au3xy7/TK7gHSDIMusO78eAv8a04QXuol8S0Nq4V7RMAvrbpSW29dddtPjg=="

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32906
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32906
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 4, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"cisco-ci-domain-verification=4f0dbd28841cdec33cfa3966c36911028ffbbcd90a6a9c4b34ecd75286ea17d2"
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.sante.gouv.fr include:_spf.pfai.rie.gouv.fr include:_spf-njo.cegedim.fr ~all"
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"MS=ms10035681"
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"R+PuUwRUOuIkhtFtitRXWrMTFS6Au3xy7/TK7gHSDIMusO78eAv8a04QXuol8S0Nq4V7RMAvrbpSW29dddtPjg=="

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59575
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59575
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 5, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	nsb.perf1.com.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	b.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	nsa.perf1.fr.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	a.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	nsc.perf1.com.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 30496
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 30496
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	SOA	a.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr. dnsmaster.sante.gouv.fr. 2024031952 14400 3600 3000000 3600

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 63954
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 63954
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:

;; ANSWER SECTION:
